title: Everybody says Jesus wrote the Bible. Is that true? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where would you get such an idea? Since when does “everybody” say? No, Jesus did not write the Bible. The Old Testament was already there and the new wasn’t written until long after ha was gone.
I wonder who you include in every body. Of the many statements about the authorship of the bible this one beats them all in its total ignorance.
Phisicaly he did not, spiritualy yes, he was the source of inspiration via the Holy Spirit who is God too. Not 3 gods, just ONE God.
Nope. Many passages, especially in Genesis, were written long before Jesus was supposedly born.
Nobody says Jesus wrote the Bible.
